data: `minecraft:on_actor_leave` is a Volume Component that defines what happens when an actor leaves the volume.

data.Name: on_leave
data.Description: Required array that contains all the triggers.

data: `on_leave` is an array parameter that can use the following components:

data.Name: condition
data.Description: Molang expression to test against the actor. The given event will be triggered if the expression evaluates to true.

data.Name: event
data.Description: Name of the event to run.

data.Name: target
data.Description: One of "self" or "other". Self means the event is attached to the volume. Other means the event is attached to the actor.
